S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3625
backporting fix (change #672834) from trunk to 10.4 branch.
Adding space check to case where we try to move row to a new page. I could not come up with a repro for this case, but seems safer to check for space than not. The case the code is trying to avoid is a free page that has been reclaimed with a nextid that requires more space than the row on the source page.
